title: Haitians Face Deportation From Dominican Republic As Deadline Nears
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish talks to Michele Wucker, author of Why the Cocks Fight: Dominicans, Haitians, and the Struggle for Hispaniola, about the tensions between Dominicans and Haitians since 1929.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
